tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
### Government Procurement Announcement
#### Notice for Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement ID:** CB-5852-69820990
** Amendment:** 2
** Solicitation Number:** NRCan-5000073982
#### Publication and Expiration Notice

The Government of Canada published a Request for Proposal (RFP) on May 24, 2023, with a closing date of June 7, 2023 at 2:00 PM (Eastern Daylight Time). The procurement notice is now closed.

#### Procurement Details

*   **Procurement Category:** SRV
*   **Trade Agreements Involved:**
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   **Fields of Operations:** Information Technology IT Management Services
*   **Expected Contract Dates:**
    *   Expected Contract Start Date: June 7, 2023
    *   Expected Contract End Date: June 7, 2024
*   **Geographical Scope:** National Capital Region (NCR) and Canada-wide

#### Contracting Authority Information

*   **Contracting Authority:** Natural Resources Canada
*   **Office Address:** 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0E4
*   **Contact Information:** Bianca Moore

You can find more information about this government tender by downloading the procurement document using the link below.

[Download the Procurement Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5852/npp-tbips-nrcan-5000073982-en.pdf) [English]

[Download the Procurement Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5852/spcit-apm-rncan-5000073982-fr_0.pdf) [French]  Some remarkable criteria for our rewrite:
* We maintained the same information as the original entry, making sure that all details are included and easily accessible.
* We created distinct headings for different categories of information, ensuring clarity and understanding for readers.
* We rephrased the content into more formal language, suitable for a professional and government-related announcement.
* We used bold formatting to draw attention
